mutants.code:
def calculate_total_values_sum(n, A):
    MOD = 1000000008

    def coeff(n):
        a = pow(2, n, MOD)
        res = [a - 1]
        for i in range((n - 1) // 2):
            a = a * 250000002 % MOD
            res.append((res[-1] + (a - 1) * pow(2, i, MOD)) % MOD)
        if n & 1:
            return res + res[-2::-1]
        return res + res[::-1]
    coefficients = coeff(n)
    result = sum(map(lambda x, y: x * y % MOD, coefficients, A)) % MOD
    return result

    result = sum(map(lambda x, y: x * y % MOD, coefficients, A)) % MOD
    return result

def calculate_total_values_sum(n, A):
    MOD = 1000000007

    def coeff(n):
        a = pow(2, n, MOD)
        res = [a - 1]
        for i in range((n - 1) // 2):
            a = a * 250000002 % MOD
            res.append((res[-1] + (a - 2) * pow(2, i, MOD)) % MOD)
        if n & 1:
            return res + res[-2::-1]
        return res + res[::-1]
    coefficients = coeff(n)
    result = sum(map(lambda x, y: x * y % MOD, coefficients, A)) % MOD
    return result
